DataElement.preferredDefinition: An article intended to be rubbed, poured, sprinkled, or sprayed on or introduced into or otherwise applied to the human body for cleansing, beautifying, promoting attractiveness or altering the appearance. The textual representation of the material.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A substance that is intended to be applied to the body to promote attractiveness without affecting the body's structure or functions.:The end result of a manufacturing process; anything that is produced.:The tangible substance that goes into the makeup of a physical object._A statement or an account describing something.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A substance that is intended to be applied to the body to promote attractiveness without affecting the body's structure or functions.:The end result of a manufacturing process; anything that is produced.:The tangible substance that goes into the makeup of a physical object.

Concepts.definition: An immunotoxin containing epitope of Pseudomonas exotoxin (PE) with immunotherapeutic property. PE, a peptide toxin of 613 amino acids, consists of 3 functional domains: an amino-terminal receptor-binding domain, a middle translocation domain, and a carboxyl-terminal ADP-ribosylation domain. The last 5 carboxyl-terminal amino acids, Arg-Glu-Asp-Leu-Lys, are critical for its cytotoxic action.
The end result of a manufacturing process; anything that is produced.
The tangible substance that goes into the makeup of a physical object.

Property.preferredDefinition: A statement or an account describing something.

Concepts.definition: A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: DEC released per model owner approval. mc 2/2/11

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Character string datatype stands for text data.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Health Informatics - Harmonized data types for information interchange

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Text; the words of something written.
